Package com.flipfit.dao

Class GymOwnerDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.GymOwnerDAO
public class GymOwnerDAO extends Object
The GymOwnerDAO class provides **Data Access Object (DAO)** functionality for managing **GymOwner** and their associated **GymCentre** entities in the FlipFit system. This class handles database operations such as creating new gym owners and gym centers, retrieving their details, and managing the approval process. It also includes methods to fetch data relevant to gym owners and administrators.
Since:
2025-08-22
Version:
1.0
Author:
YourName

  • Method Details

    • getGymOwnerById

      public Optional<GymOwner> getGymOwnerById(int userId)
      Retrieves a GymOwner by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user which is also the gym owner's ID.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the GymOwner if found, otherwise an empty Optional.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if a database access error occurs.

    • addGym

      public int addGym(GymCentre gym)
      Adds a new gym center to the database.
      Parameters:
      gym - The GymCentre object to be added.
      Returns:
      The auto-generated gym ID.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if a database access error occurs.

    • addSlots

      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The GymOwner object containing the updated details.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if a database access error occurs or if the gym owner is not found.

    • getPendingGymRequests

      public List<GymCentre> getPendingGymRequests()

      Returns:
      A List of GymCentre objects that are not yet approved.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if a database access error occurs.

      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym to approve.
      Throws:
      DAOException - if a database access error occurs or if the gym is not found.
